name: 30 seconds only 1 level
description:
This is a submisson to TriJam and GMTK jam. While I didn't make the game in 3h (it took waaay more!) it fits the themes  of TriJam - "30 seconds" and GMTK jam - "only one".

Story:

Billy Bob had an accident at his office job and ended up trapped in a purgatory time loop! HOW DOES THAT EVEN HAPPEN?! He has 30 seconds to get all the Death keys to save himself before he's trapped in the black void of purgatory... FOREVER!

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD

Credits:

FONT: Press Start 2P: https://fonts.google.com/selection?selection.family=Press+Start+2P

SOUNDS and MUSIC:
level up: https://freesound.org/people/ScreamStudio/sounds/412165/
game over: https://freesound.org/people/ScreamStudio/sounds/412168/
blip: https://freesound.org/people/Greenhourglass/sounds/159377/
victory music: https://freesound.org/people/annoyedCactus/sounds/455017/
key pickup: https://freesound.org/people/SamsterBirdies/sounds/368492/
in-game music: https://freesound.org/people/bone666138/sounds/466998/
